item.title: Reserve a spot for a handicraft workshop at the Etsy Craft Party 2016 - Summer Edition
item.description: Individuals with a creative spirit or those seeking engaging team-building exercises might be interested in three craft workshops featured at the “Etsy Craft Party 2016 - The Summer Edition” on June 18, 2016. The Singapore edition of this annual Etsy event is organized by Crafty Singapore, with support from Etsy. Source: Crafty Singapore. Finished embroidery on tiny ‘mini’ embroidery hoops. Needlework on a Miniature Hoop Presented by Wish I Were Stitching (two sessions, eight participants per session)
